short_summary: RISO - Aerial Lift Platform Rental for the period of 1 October 2022 to 30 September 2025
description: The contracting authority has a requirement to establish a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) to provide Electric and Propane aerial lift platforms on an as and when required basis at the Fleet Maintenance Facility Cape Scott (FMFCS) located in Halifax, Nova Scotia.
full_summary:
### RISO - Aerial Lift Platform Rental
#### Notice of Request for Standing Offer

**Notice Number**: PW-HAL-411-11555
**Tender Closing Date**: September 15, 2022
**Contracting Entity Name**: Public Works and Government Services Canada
**Contact Name**: Erin Surette
**Contact Email**: Erin.Surette@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca
**Contact Phone**: (902) 476-5077
**Contact Fax**: (902) 496-5016

**Tender Summary**

Public Services and Procurement Canada is seeking a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) provider to supply electrical and propane aerial lift platforms to the Department of National Defence. The selected supplier will be required to provide aerial lift platforms on an as-and-when-required basis at the Fleet Maintenance Facility Cape Scott (FMFCS) in Halifax, Nova Scotia.

**Service Requirements**

* Provide electrical and propane aerial lift platforms to the Department of National Defence
* Platforms will be required for use at the Fleet Maintenance Facility Cape Scott (FMFCS) in Halifax, Nova Scotia
* The period of the RISO is from October 1, 2022 to September 30, 2025
* The RISO will be used to support the DND's maintenance requirements

**Bid Submission Instructions**

* Interested suppliers must submit a bid electronically through CPC Connect Service
* The bid submission file must be in accordance with the specifications outlined in the solicitation package
* Proposals must be submitted to the Public Works and Government Services Canada Bid Receiving Unit by September 15, 2022 at 13:00 Eastern Time

**Important Dates**

* September 15, 2022: Bid submission deadline
* October 1, 2022: RISO period begins

**Evaluation Criteria**

* Offers will be evaluated based on the total lowest aggregate evaluated price
* Offers must comply with the requirements outlined in the solicitation package

**Inquiries**

* All technical and contract-related inquiries should be submitted in writing to Erin Surette at Erin.Surette@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca
* Inquiries must be submitted no later than seven (7) calendar days before the bid submission deadline

**Language of Bid**

* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada

**Additional Information**

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement
* Interested suppliers may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation
